items.sentence: I wish you didn\'t have to go to work today.

No other language is as beautiful as French.
Tom and Mary live in a very small apartment.
How much does that puppy in the window cost?
I\'ll be arriving by train tomorrow evening.
This is the hospital where Tom used to work.
Tom doesn\'t get along with Mary\'s parents.
Everyone except Tom is planning to be there.
Find Tom and ask him what you just asked me.
